findStrings.find: added a setup and teardown method to setup and clear the table respectively

task.summary: Default task
added git ignore to avoid tracking unnecessary files
added the stylist class to create and handle stylists and added its test.
added test to check whether stylist object instantiates correctly
added test to check whether stylist first name gets saved correctly
added test to check whether stylist second name gets saved correctly
added test to check whether stylist email,age and Id gets saved correctly
created Db class to manage database interactions.
added methods to save stylist, get a list of all stylist and find a given stylist and their respective tests.
added Client class and its test to be used to create and handle client instances.
added getters for each field
added a setup and teardown method to setup and clear the table respectively
added test to check whether all the fields instantiates correctly
Added test to check whether clients are saved to the database, find clients by their id and retrieve all clients.
Added methods to save clients to the database, find clients by their id and retrieve all clients.
added implementation to retrieve clients belonging to a given stylist based on their id
added App class to handle ui and its operations
added a resources folder to store images and css stylesheets
added a templates and routes to handle the various requests.
added added a stylist route with its repective template to display a table of all stylists.
updated the password to the postgress database.
Added a success page to display when a stylist gets added successfully.
Added implementation for adding new clients to the salon.
Added stylist/:id route to display a specific stylist details and the clients they have.
added the ability to delete a given stylist.
added stylist/:id/edit route to edit a given stylist.
added the ability to edit a give stylists details using a form and the update method.
added the ability to view a single client
added the delete method and its test to delete clients based on their id.
added the route to delete a given client.
added method update and its test to update clients details.
added an edit form to edit clients details.
added a favicon.
compressed background image size to reduce page load time.
specified the port the app should run on, on heroku. port 4567.
